mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_field WHERE table_id = #{fid} and name = #{name} and delete_time = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_field WHERE (delete_time != 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,delete_time, current_timestamp()) > #{expiredTimeLenS}) OR (table_id not in (SELECT id FROM sys_table WHERE delete_time != 0))
